title: Arudal kUra
sahitya:
Arudal kUra yAraiyA un aDimaikkinda aghandai ulagilE


anupallavi

  vEru vEru samaya shuzhalil vEdanaippaTTEn shOdanai pOdum


caraNam    karuNaiyaTra palarai nAn kaDavuL enru tozhudEn kavitai pADi azhudEn
kAlaDiyil uzhudEn avar kaTTaLaigaLai vazhuvEn aruLinri en poruLaikkoNDu
teruvil viTTAr dInanukkE deivamE ini unakkE paNi sheivad-urudi urudi urudiyE
